propositions.text: The story is titled "死亡通知单之宿命".
The author is Zhou Haohui.
The '引子' (Prologue) describes a meeting between a younger person and an older, monstrous figure.
The meeting takes place in a foul-smelling, garbage-filled area under a bridge.
This location is chosen because they don't want to be disturbed.
The atmosphere of this meeting is different from previous ones.
The younger person is overly excited.
The older person tries to calm the younger person down.
The older figure has a monstrous, disfigured face.
The younger person asks about their next meeting.
The older figure states there will be no next meeting.
The older figure tells the younger person they are strong enough and no longer need guidance.
The younger person expresses uncertainty about the path ahead.
The older figure reveals that the younger person's destiny was set eighteen years prior.
The older figure then leaves, his shadow stretching out, conveying loneliness and sorrow.
A scene is described on October 26, 2002, at 9:25 AM at the site of the Bifang Garden Hotel on Xingcheng Road.
It is an explosion site with a long cordon.
Onlookers are kept outside the cordon, craning their necks.
The center of the cordon is a ruin.
The air smells of gunpowder and death.
Firefighters are clearing debris.
Men in white, identified as forensic doctors from the provincial police, are collecting items.
These items are human remains, collected in large black plastic bags.
The onlookers react with murmurs when something is found.
The younger person, referred to as '年轻人', is observing the scene from a high vantage point in a nearby office building using binoculars.
He mutters '老师...' (Teacher...).
His expression is complex, showing sadness, reluctance, and deep confusion.
He ponders the mysterious questions that have troubled him for years.
He questions his own origins ('我？我从哪里来？').
He believes only his teacher can answer these questions.
He finds solace in the teacher's words: 'You will definitely keep going.'
He resolves to keep going.
A scene is described on the same day at 3:17 PM at the five-star Wanfeng Hotel.
The hotel is located in the most prosperous area of the provincial city and has top-notch decor.
The suite is on the top floor, offering an unobstructed view of the city.
The suite is expensive, costing over a thousand yuan per day even in the off-season.
Wu Yinwu, an almost sixty-year-old man, is in the suite.
This is his first time in such a high-class place.
He feels overwhelmed and sits stiffly on the sofa.
Three young people are also in the suite, exhibiting a contrasting demeanor.
They are not reserved and roam around, fiddling with expensive items.
These three young people consist of two boys and one girl.
Their attire is eccentric, suggesting they are 'delinquents' among their peers.
They are actually only sixteen or seventeen years old.
One of the boys wears a large yellow earring.
He throws himself onto a sofa, causing the elder man to jolt.

concepts.name: 年轻人
concepts.context: Refers to the protagonist, observed in various settings.

concepts.name: 怪物
concepts.context: Refers to the older, disfigured figure met in the prologue.

concepts.name: 宿命
concepts.context: Fate or destiny, central theme mentioned for the protagonist.

concepts.name: 老师
concepts.context: Referred to by the protagonist, implying a guiding figure.

concepts.name: 法医
concepts.context: Professionals collecting human remains at the explosion site.

concepts.name: 人体遗骸
concepts.context: Human remains found at the explosion site.

concepts.name: 迷茫
concepts.context: The protagonist's feeling of confusion and uncertainty.

concepts.name: 吴寅午
concepts.context: An older man in a high-class hotel suite.

concepts.name: 高档场所
concepts.context: Describes luxurious settings like the hotel suite.

concepts.name: 年轻人
concepts.context: Used to describe the three young individuals in the hotel suite.

hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a title and author, followed by a prologue that introduces key characters and themes. It then transitions to a scene describing a crime investigation, and finally to a scene in a luxurious setting with different characters.
